thread.title: Public Notice Crown Castle is proposing to install a new
thread.title_full: Public Notice Crown Castle is proposing to install a new

title: Public Notice Crown Castle is proposing to install a new
text:
Public Notice Crown Castle is proposing to install a new ad date: 10/17/2015 
Public Notice Crown Castle is proposing to install a new tower (replacing old tower) at the following site: #857625 Hunter Creek located off of 11th Street in Gold Beach, Curry Co., OR (lat: 42-23-47.8 long: 124-24-47.63). There will be no lighting required. Crown Castle invites comments from any interested party on the impact of the proposed action on any districts, sites, buildings, structures or objects significant in American history, archaeology, engineering or culture that are listed or determined eligible for listing in the National Register of Historic Places and/or specific reason the proposed action may have a significant impact on the quality of the human environment. Specific information regarding the project is available by calling Monica Gambino 724-416-2516 during normal business hours. Comments must be received at 2000 Corporate Drive in Canonsburg, PA 15317 by 11-14-15. Crown Castle is also notifying any interested party that believes the proposed action may have a significant impact on the environment that a Request for Environmental Review) may be submitted to the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). Such Requests may only raise environmental concerns. The Request must be filed with the FCC within 30 days of the notice being posted on the FCC website. Information regarding the project may be found under file number A0980998 on the FCC website www.fcc.gov/asr/applications. The FCC strongly encourages that all Requests be filed electronically at www.fcc.gov/asr/environmentalrequest. Requests may also be mailed to: FCC Requests for Environmental Review, 445 12th Street SW, Washington, DC 20554, ATTN: Ramon Williams. The Request must also be served upon Crown Castle by mailing a copy to 2000 Corporate Drive, Canonsburg, PA 15317 ATTN: Legal Department. Publish October 17, 2015
